text: Mieko Yagi (9 June 1950 - 24 November 2015) was a Japanese equestrian. She competed in two events at the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Japanese female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Tokyo Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Equestrians at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games
title: Mieko Yagi
